title: Non-linear non-zero-sum Dynkin games with Bermudan strategies. (arXiv:2311.01086v1 [math.OC])
abstract: In this paper, we study a non-zero-sum game with two players, where each of the players plays what we call Bermudan strategies and optimizes a general non-linear assessment functional of the pay-off. By using a recursive construction, we show that the game has a Nash equilibrium point.
context:
Title: Non-linear non-zero-sum Dynkin games with Bermudan strategies. (arXiv:2311.01086v1 [math.OC])
Abstract: In this paper, we study a non-zero-sum game with two players, where each of the players plays what we call Bermudan strategies and optimizes a general non-linear assessment functional of the pay-off. By using a recursive construction, we show that the game has a Nash equilibrium point.
translated_title: 非线性非零和的Bermudan策略Dynkin博弈研究
translated_abstract: 本文研究了一种包含两个玩家的非零和博弈，每个玩家使用所谓的Bermudan策略，并优化一个通用的非线性评估函数的收益。通过使用递归构造，我们证明该博弈存在纳什均衡点。
tldr: 本文研究了一种非零和博弈，玩家采用Bermudan策略，并优化非线性评估函数的收益。通过递归构造，证明了该博弈存在纳什均衡点。
